alert.note: Alert for Maverick (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Maverick County through 745 AM CDT... At 659 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Quemado to 11 miles west of Eagle Pass to 23 miles southwest of Rosita. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eagle Pass, Quemado, El Indio, Chula Vista, Paloma, Darling, Radar Base, Normandy, Rosita, Fabrica, Las Quintas Fronterizas, Siesta Acres, Eidson Road, Elm Creek and Seco Mines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
